EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.DynatraceWorkshopConfEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform - Dynatrace Workshop | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Building the Unbreakable Continuous Delivery Pipeline: Put Your Concourse Pipeline on Auto-Pilot with Dynatrace <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/workshops/dynatrace]]> on September 24th in Washington D.C.
Date: Monday, September 24, 2018
Time:
9:00AM to 10:20AM
Room: Annapolis 3-4
Please note, you must be registered for SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> to attend this workshop.
The SpringOne Platform Team
